skills.name: Woosh
skills.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

skills.name: Sandtorm
skills.description: Whips up a dense cloud of dust that lowers the accuracy of enemy attacks for 2 to 5 turns.

skills.name: Acceleratle
skills.description: Increases the agility of all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

skills.name: Insulate
skills.description: Greatly reduces the damage received from breath attacks by a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

skills.name: Wind Sickles
skills.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental damage on a single enemy.

skills.name: Insulate
skills.description: Reduces the damage received from breath attacks by all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

skills.name: Brake Wind
skills.description: Reflects breath attacks back at the enemy. Protects all allies once only.

skills.name: Thin Air
skills.description:
Inflicts medium wind-elemental damage on all enemies.
The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.
